short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load your company's Workshop employee hub dashboard directly into your browser's new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Workshop is an internal communication platform designed to keep teams informed, connected, and engaged.

Workshop's lightweight Chrome extension loads your company hub directly into your browser's new tab window, giving you fast access to the latest information throughout the day.
